title: Advent looking to deploy $5 to $10 billion in India over the next five years
description: Advent International believes that Indian valuations are not a barrier to making deals, as they are relative to growth opportunities and risk returns. The firm views the premium valuations in India as a reflection of the significant growth opportunities and the relative attractiveness of the market. Last year alone, it invested $7 billion in new opportunities ranging from cybersecurity to pharma, but more importantly, realised $8.4 billion via exits â€” higher than their previous five-year average of $5.7 billion.
